user_query: Find the details of a specific song on Shazam using its ID. Also, provide me with the current date and time in America__Los_Angeles timezone. Additionally, fetch the details of the containing populated place for a specific place ID.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of the song using the provided Shazam song ID.
Get the current date and time in America/Los_Angeles timezone.
Fetch the details of the populated place using the provided place ID.
